text: Resort in Ambarita, Samosir Regency Batak Toba House in Simanindo, Samosir Regency Tomok Market, Samosir Regency Samosir Regency is a regency in North Sumatra. Its seat is Pangururan. The regency covers an area of 1,444.25 square kilometres and according to the 2010 census it had a population of 119,653; the most recent official estimate (for mid 2018) showed the population as 125,816.Badan Pusat Statistik, Jakarta, 2020. == Administration == The regency is divided administratively into nine districts (kecamatan), tabulated below with their 2010 Census population,Biro Pusat Statistik, Jakarta, 2011. together with the estimated populations in mid 2018:Badan Pusat Statistik, Jakarta, 2020. The table also includes the number of administrative villages (desa and kelurahan) in each district and its post code. {| class="sortable wikitable" |- ! Name ||Area in km2|| Pop'n Census 2010|| Pop'n Estimate mid 2018Badan Pusat Statistik, Jakarta, 2020.||No. of vill.||Post code |- | Sianjur Mula Mula ||align="right"|140.24||align="right"|9,138||align="right"|9,600||align="right"|12||22396 |- | Harian ||align="right"|560.45||align="right"|7,860||align="right"|8,239||align="right"|13||22391 |- | Sitio-tio ||align="right"|50.76||align="right"|7,124||align="right"|7,445||align="right"|8||22397 |- | Onan Runggu ||align="right"|60.89||align="right"|10,329||align="right"|10,862||align="right"|12||22398 |- | Nainggolan ||align="right"|87.86||align="right"|11,849||align="right"|12,463||align="right"|15||22394 |- | Palipi ||align="right"|129.55||align="right"|16,087||align="right"|16,924||align="right"|17||22393 |- | Ronggur Nihuta ||align="right"|94.87||align="right"|8,356||align="right"|8,768||align="right"|8||22392 |- | Pangururan ||align="right"|121.45||align="right"|29,412||align="right"|30,986||align="right"|28||22390 |- | Simanindo ||align="right"|198.20||align="right"|19,498||align="right"|20,529||align="right"|21||22395 |- | Totals ||align="right"|1,444.25||align="right"|119,653||align="right"|125,816||align="right"|134|| |} Six of the nine districts (kecamatan) within the regency are on the island of Samosir (which lies within Lake Toba), while the others lie on the 'mainland' of Sumatra. * Samosir Island districts ** Onan Runggu ** Palipi ** Pangururan ** Ronggur Nihuta ** Simanindo ** Nainggolan * Mainland districts ** Sitio-tio ** Harian ** Sianjur Mula Mula However, a small part of Pangururan District lies on the mainland, cut off from the rest of the district by the canal. ==Botanical Garden== 2011: Samosir Regency with supervision from LIPI will build a 100 hectares Botanical Garden. It will finish 10 years later with cost predicted about Rp.73 billion ($8.6 million). ==Geo park== A geopark worth Rp20 billion ($2.2 million) is expected to be created - beginning in mid-2012 - in cooperation with the Agency for the Assessment and Application of Technology (BPPT). It has been proposed for incorporation into the world geo park network. ==References== Category:Regencies of North Sumatra
title: Samosir Regency
